title: More the merrier:  3 new State Ministers
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa yesterday appointed three more State Ministers in addition to 24 appointed earlier this week.

The new State Ministers sworn in yesterday were Sadasivam Viyalendran as the State Minister of Youth and Sports; Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan as the State Minister of Rural Road Development and Mohammad Musharraf as the State Minister of Textile and Local Apparel Production Promotion.
The State Minister Dr. Suren Raghavan’s portfolio was amended as State Minister of Higher Education as opposed to Education Services and Reform previously.
